title: Billionaire Goes To “Space”, Friend Zone Is Best Zone? 7.13.21
itunes:title: Billionaire Goes To “Space”, Friend Zone Is Best Zone? 7.13.21
description:
In episode 949, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Jacquis Neal to discuss rent relief, billionaires in space, vaccine numbers at CPAC, anti-vaxxers at the Olympics, friendships ending in relationships, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. California has $5.2 billion in COVID aid to help you pay rent, utility debts. How to apply
  2. Trump takes credit for billionaires' race to space
  3. As COVID ravages this corner of Missouri, health workers agonize over the unvaccinated
  4. U.S. swimmer Michael Andrew on why he will go to Tokyo without coronavirus vaccine
  5. Two-thirds of romantic couples start out as friends, study finds
  6. LISTEN: Marjan - Kavire del

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
